title: Ermanno Fasoli
summary: Ermanno Fasoli (born 9 November 1943) is an Italian boxer. He competed in the men's light welterweight event at the 1964 Summer Olympics.
content:
Ermanno Fasoli (born 9 November 1943) is an Italian boxer. He competed in the men's light welterweight event at the 1964 Summer Olympics.
